de.iss.mv2.io

Class ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.iss.mv2.io.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationPartner, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements CommunicationPartner
    A thread to perform the communication with a client.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
